oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Map of East Tennessee, 1863
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sam B. Palmer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hand drawn and hand-colored Map of East Tennessee drawn by Lt. Sam B. (Samuel Bell) Palmer, Knoxville (Tennessee), August 1863. 15 x 9.5" Confederate flag at right.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps; Civil wars; Flags;
